mapper.select: select a.trv_seq as trvSeq, a.cat_seq as catSeq, a.crt_date as crtDate, a.name as name, a.contents, a.hours, a.location, a.picture, a.price, a.map_url as mapURL, a.contact, a.picture as picture, a.hit as hit, a.RECMD_BLOG as recmdBlog, a.RECMD_EMOJ as recmdEmoj, a.RECMD_TRIPAD as recmdTripAd, a.WORDCLOUD as wordCloud from travel_info a where a.cty_seq = #{ctySeq} and a.trv_seq > 0 order by hit desc
select trv_seq as trvSeq, cat_seq as catSeq, crt_date as crtDate, name as name, contents, hours, location, picture, price, map_url as mapURL, contact from travel_info
select trv_seq as trvSeq, cat_seq as catSeq, crt_date as crtDate, name as name, contents, hours, location, picture, price, map_url as mapURL, contact from travel_info where trv_seq = #{trvSeq }

select a.trv_seq as trvSeq, a.cty_seq as ctySeq, a.cat_seq as catSeq, a.crt_date as crtDate, a.name as name, a.contents as contents, a.hours as hours, a.location as location, a.picture as picture, a.price as price, a.map_url as mapURL, a.contact as contact, a.hit as hit, a.RECMD_BLOG as recmdBlog, a.RECMD_EMOJ as recmdEmoj, a.RECMD_TRIPAD as recmdTripAd, a.WORDCLOUD as wordCloud from travel_info a where a.CAT_SEQ <> 1
union all
select a.trv_seq as trvSeq, a.cty_seq as ctySeq, a.cat_seq as catSeq, a.crt_date as crtDate, a.name as name, a.contents as contents, a.hours as hours, a.location as location, a.picture as picture, a.price as price, a.map_url as mapURL, a.contact as contact, cty_rank.hit, a.RECMD_BLOG as recmdBlog, a.RECMD_EMOJ as recmdEmoj, a.RECMD_TRIPAD as recmdTripAd, a.WORDCLOUD as wordCloud from travel_info a, (select cty_seq, sum(hit) as hit from travel_info where CAT_SEQ != 1 group by cty_seq order by sum(hit) desc limit 0,12 ) cty_rank where a.CAT_SEQ = 1 and a.CTY_SEQ = cty_rank.cty_seq order by hit desc

select a.trv_seq as trvSeq, a.cty_seq as ctySeq, a.cat_seq as catSeq, a.crt_date as crtDate, a.name as name, a.contents as contents, a.hours as hours, a.location as location, a.picture as picture, a.price as price, a.map_url as mapURL, a.contact as contact, cty_rank.hit from travel_info a left join travel_info_pic b on a.TRV_SEQ = b.TRV_SEQ, (select cty_seq, sum(hit) as hit from travel_info where CAT_SEQ != 1 group by cty_seq order by sum(hit) desc limit 0,12 ) cty_rank where a.CAT_SEQ = 1 and a.CTY_SEQ = cty_rank.cty_seq order by hit desc

select trv_seq as trvSeq, concat(name, (select CONCAT(" (",cty_name,", ",ctr_name,")") from city ci, country co where ci.CTR_SEQ = co.CTR_SEQ and ci.cty_seq = travel_info.cty_seq)) as name from travel_info where trv_seq >0 and cat_seq != 1 order by name

select travel_info.crt_date as crtDate, travel_info.NAME as name, travel_info.CONTENTS as contents, hours, location, picture, price, map_url as mapURL, contact from scrap, travel_info where scrap.TRV_SEQ=travel_info.TRV_SEQ AND scrap.usr_seq = #{usrSeq }

select cty.CTY_SEQ as ctySeq, cty.CTY_NAME as name, ctr.CTR_NAME as contents from city cty, country ctr where (cty.CTY_NAME like '%${_parameter}%' or ctr.CTR_NAME like '%${_parameter}%') and cty.CTR_SEQ = ctr.CTR_SEQ and cty_seq != -1
select cty_seq as ctySeq from city_search where cty_name = #{ctyName }
mapper.update: update travel_info set hit=hit+1 where trv_seq= #{trvSeq}
mapper.select: select luxury_yn as luxuryYN from travel_info where trv_seq = #{trvSeq } and cat_seq = 2
